name: image-resizer
title: Image Resizer
content:
Overview

This application resizes images to specific dimensions with high-quality resampling. Built using Pillow, it uses the LANCZOS algorithm for optimal quality when scaling images.

Features

  • Resize images to 800x600 pixels by default
  • High-quality LANCZOS resampling
  • Preserves original file format
  • Optimized quality settings

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a resized image with the suffix _resized_800x600 in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Standardizing image dimensions for galleries
  • Reducing image size for web display
  • Creating consistent-sized images for presentations
  • Preparing images for specific platform requirements
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_resizer.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -w 800 -H 600
